name: Boboy Garrovillo
description: '''Jose''' '''Teves Garrovillo Jr.''' (born October 10, 1951), better known as '''Boboy Garrovillo''', is a Filipino actor and musician. He is known as one of the members of the popular musical trio [[APO Hiking Society]] along with [[Danny Javier]] and [[Jim Paredes]]. He is also regarded as one of the pillars and icons of [[Music of the Philippines|Original Pilipino Music]] (OPM).
